message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $875000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my target price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer $850000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that we're getting close to a deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $880000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $880000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
